Captain Sylas "Silverfin" Drayke

Captain Sylas Drayke once commanded the Silverfin, a nimble brigantine feared across the Azure Isles. Known for his cunning tricks and devil-may-care attitude, Sylas was a charismatic leader, if not always reliable. A mutiny led by his first mate left him shipless, stranded in a port tavern with little more than a dagger and his wits. He now seeks his next big opportunity to reclaim his freedom and fortune.

Feats

Lucky

When you roll a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

Alert

+5 bonus to initiative. You can't be surprised while you are conscious. Other creatures don't gain advantage on attack rolls against you as a result of being hidden from you.
